Description: Body sherd of Egyptian black ware pottery closed vessel, possibly an amphora; dark grey Nile silt core sandwiched between brown to red margins, with mica inclusions; very dark (almost black) slip on exterior; complex added decoration in relief of two poppy pods, three stems, and leaves.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.095)
